A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Was The Last Jedi the Best Star Wars Film ever? Can it even be compared to Empire Strikes Back? That is a big NO\, not even by a long shot. The movie answered no questions from the previous film\, Had a Hero that absolutely did nothing\, a General Leía that had super human powers to survive the vaccum of Space\, and at times felt like a Animated Disney movie more so than a Star Wars saga. With all that being said\, the movie did keep me awake and focused for 2 and a half hours. It did not make the top 3 best but it was enjoyable just enough to get a pass.
